Sentencas: Proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H+-SOFC) offer reduced temperature operation when compared to traditional oxygen anion conducting SOFCs.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, one potential drawback is a loss of fuel flexibility as H+-SOFCs require hydrogen as a fuel.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study we examine the use of Ni, Ni-Cu, and Cu-based anodes for the internal steam reforming of methanol and ethanol on the H+-SOFC anode.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: When compared to hydrogen fuel, the cell performance is lower in all of the alcohol fuels due to lower hydrogen content in the reformate.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Ni provides substantially higher performance than Cu due to increased steam reforming activity towards hydrogen production and may increase hydrogen incorporation kinetics.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Significant carbon deposition was noted on the Ni anode when operating on ethanol fuel, even with a 4:1 steam: carbon ratio.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Only limited carbon deposition was noted for the Cu anode.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Alloying Ni with Cu was shown to help limit carbon formation at the anode.
Titulo: On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
On the Choice of Anode Electrocatalyst for Alcohol Fuelled Proton Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
